I-am-description: I'm a software developer from Vienna. How do you want to get to know me?
about-me-description: I am a fullstack developer working remotely from Vienna. Before embarking on my journey as a software developer I studied nutritional science and genetics and worked as a molecular biologist. I generally love learning new skills, from animation to cooking to playing the piano.
ava-description: AvaAssist connects people with disabilities to personal assistants. It also provides a platform for organizations to manage their personal assistants and clients.
cleanly-description: Cleanly is a webapp that allows users to book cleaning services online. It is currently not maintained.
origame-description: A mockup of an ecommerce store. It has a fully functional shopping cart and checkout process, but with no payment.
ava-role: Fullstack Developer role in a small development team using different technologies. Conception of new project features, UI/UX design in Figma, design and development of the frontend and backend, writing tests, deployment and writing documentation.
cleanly-role: Fullstack Developer project that implements different technologies. Conception of the complete project including user journeys, UI/UX design in Figma, database design, development of the frontend and backend, writing tests and deployment of the project.
origame-role: Fullstack Developer project that implements different technologies. Conception of the complete project including design and development of the frontend and backend, writing tests and deployment of the project.
not-bored: I hope you're less bored now.
not-bored-lost: However, I hope you're less bored now.
pattern-match-description: Try to match the pattern that is shown in the beginning of each level by clicking on the right tiles
didnt-win: You didn't win, but at least you tried!
help-me-feedback: Help me become a better developer by giving me feedback! What did you like most about my page?
the-people-liked: This is what the visitors of my page liked the most:
using-safari: Hey there, you're using Safari, right?
not-optimized-for-safari: Please keep in mind that this website is not optimized for Safari and you may experience some issues. If you can please use another browser like Chrome or Firefox.
let-me-in-anyway: Got it! Let me in anyway, I don't care!
ball-description: Website and booking tool for tickets of the 'Althietzingerball', a ball that is held every year in Vienna. Additionally to visiting the site and check the most important information, the user can send a booking request for tickets to the host, which gets handled by the custom-built API.
ball-role: Conception and implementation of the entire freelance project as a solo fullstack developer. Creation of the UI/UX design + user journeys. Development of the front- and backend including deployment and SEO. Communication with project managers and implementation of requested features.
name: Name
contact-text: I am always open to new opportunities and projects. If you have any questions or just want to say hi, feel free to contact me!
get-back: I will get back to you as soon as possible.
nameMoreThan2: Name must be at least 2 characters long
privacyPolicyRequired: The privacy policy must be accepted
portfolio-moved: My portfolio has moved to a new domain. Click on the button below to check it out!
realitiq-description: Realitiq is an innovative approach to visualization, configuration, and data analysis in the real estate sector. It includes a mobile app, a webplatform and a web-based editor as tools to scan, visualize and edit real estate properties. It also leverages multiple AI features and virtual tours.
realitiq-role: Lead Developer for the Realitiq Editor. Responsible for designing the software architecture and developing the application. Mentoring junior developers. Fullstack development including testing and continuous integration (CI).
